content: I'm excited to add the Java Moss and Anacharis to my tank this weekend. I've been preparing the tank by soaking them in a separate container to get rid of any snails or parasites. I'm also planning to create a DIY background for my tank using foam and rocks, which I think will provide a nice hiding place for my fish and add some visual interest to the tank. By the way, I've been doing a 10% water change every week, and I've been cleaning the filter every two weeks. Do you think that's a good maintenance schedule?
